result.name: 40ar-39ar-ages-of-ice-rafted-sand-sized-hornblende-and-mica-deposited-in-iceberg-alley-nerc-gra
result.notes: 40Ar/39Ar ages of 37 mica and 21 hornblende from the sand-sized fraction of an iceberg-rafted debris-rich layer deposited in the Scotia Sea at IODP Site U1538 ~1.2 million years ago during the early Pleistocene.
